owner.content: owner → COMP : Get or set the component this pane points to.

id.content: id → int (Read Only): A unique numeric identifier.

link.content: link → int : Get or set the numeric link index.

enable.content: enable → bool : Get or set mouse and keyboard interactivity on the pane.

maximize.content: maximize → bool : Enable or disable the pane maximize state.

name.content: name → str : Get or set the pane name.

ratio.content: ratio → float : Get or set the split proportion of the pane, if the pane was previously split.

bottomLeft.content: bottomLeft → Coords (Read Only): The coordinates of the bottom left corner, expressed as both x/y and u/v in a named tuple.

topRight.content: topRight → Coords (Read Only): The coordinates of the top right corner, expressed as both x/y and u/v in a named tuple.

type.content:
type → PaneType (Read Only): The enumerated type of the pane. Example: NetworkEditor.
The enumeration is called PaneType and consists of:

PaneType.NETWORKEDITOR
PaneType.PANEL
PaneType.GEOMETRYVIEWER
PaneType.TOPVIEWER
PaneType.CHOPVIEWER
PaneType.ANIMATIONEDITOR
PaneType.PARAMETERS
PaneType.TEXTPORT

changeType.content:
changeType(paneType)→ td.Pane: Change the pane to the specified type.  Will return a new Pane object that represents the Pane. After being called, the current Pane instance will no longer be valid.
paneType - The type of pane to change this pane to.p = ui.panes[0]
p = p.changeType(PaneType.TOPVIEWER)  # note: must re-assign p to new object.

floatingCopy.content: floatingCopy()→ td.Pane: Return a floating copy of the pane.

splitBottom.content: splitBottom()→ td.Pane: Split the bottom portion of the pane into a new pane.

splitLeft.content: splitLeft()→ td.Pane: Split the left portion of the pane into a new pane.

splitRight.content: splitRight()→ td.Pane: Split the right portion of the pane into a new pane.

splitTop.content: splitTop()→ td.Pane: Split the top portion of the pane into a new pane.

tearAway.content: tearAway()→ bool: Detach the pane into a floating window. Returns True if successful. TouchDesigner Build: Latest\nwikieditor2021.100002020.200002018.28070before 2018.28070
